page.title: 18MY HOME (2)
page.content: 3 Lawn Chase,Witham,Essex. AS you walk in on the right is the downstairs cloakroom,on the left isthe Kitchen with a fridge,a cooker,a gas hob,some cupboards,and a dishwasher.In the utility room there is a freezer,a washing machine,tumble dryer,spin drier,and a fridge. We also have book shelves and a trunk for storage.There is a boiler room where water is heated to circulate to the radiators in the rooms.In the utility room also are the computer,a disc drive ,a tape recorder,and two televisions, one coloured.In The dining room is a radiator,table and chairs, a drinks cabinet, and a cabinet containing ornaments.In the lounge is a stereo system, wood fire place,2 settees, a desk, a T.V.,a video and a rocking chair.The house was built 11 years ago from brick,wood& cement.Alex Smart 11.
